title: f/s: t206 matty psa 1 white hat

posts.post_title: f/s: t206 matty psa 1 white hat
posts.post_content:
**see below post for matty**

a couple light wrinkles/creases...looks G/VG to me with a factory miscut with a bit of his name on top.  guaranteed to grade numerically.

YOUNG SOLD


[IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo147/quannimir/cards/ys.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo147/quannimir/cards/ysb-1.jpg[/IMG]

psa1 matty that i won from sterling...afterward another board member offered me an upgrade and i took it, so this one is available.  i paid $122 shipped for this...price is $126 (FIRM) shipped via a check, or trade for a psa 1.5/sgc20 t206 lajoie w/bat.

i sent brian a check so i haven't gotten like all the pp payers...but i anticipate getting it early next week (unless brian waits for my $240 check to clear)
